name: Name
empire_tab_description: This mod currently provides default Chinese/English localization for the game
create_empire_description: Force the selected country into the empire
remove_title_description: Remove the title from the selected city
empire_selected: One country selected; select another to form an empire
unity_joined_empire: This country has been absorbed into the empire
save_freeze_toggle_Text Description: Because saving causes lag and there is no current workaround, you can disable the mod’s save feature here (re-enable in mod settings if you need to save)
create_title_description: Click a city to create a new title
add_title_description: Add selected city to the specified title
prevent_city_destroy_description: When enabled, if a city’s population falls below 1, troops will be sent to replenish its population
empire_royal_clan_changed: $actor$ usurped the empire’s mandate and renamed it $new_empire_name$
kingdom_royal_clan_changed_2: $new_clan$ defeated $old_clan$ and became the new ruler of $kingdom$
powerful_minister_aquire_empire_war: $title$ $ministor$ attempted to seize the empire’s mandate, declared war
become_new_empire_log: $emperor$ crowned themselves emperor, naming the empire $kingdom_name$
opinion_different_empire_with_other_subs: Another Empire of the Same Race
empire_powerful_minister_aquire_title: Minister $ministor$ petitioned $empire$’s sovereign for the title $title$
become_kingdom_log: $actor$ renamed their realm to $kingdom$ upon acquiring the title $title$
city_add_to_title_log: $city$ was added to the title $title_name$’s domain
Title_Freeze_Toggle Description: Titles will not be automatically destroyed
title_layer_description: Display title domains on the map
kingdom_selected_first: First kingdom selected; select another or an empire to create/join an empire
city_selected_first: First city selected; select another city or title domain to create/join a title
history_new_empire: $actor$ proclaimed themselves emperor at $place$, named the empire $name$, established capital at $place$
history_new_emperor: $actor$ ascended the throne at $place$, era name $year_name$
history_powerful_ministor: $title$ $actor$ controlled the court, $actor2$ became a puppet
histroy_empire_die: Emperor $actor$ of the $year_name$ era passed away
history_name_previous_emperor: $actor$ posthumously honored former emperor $actor2$, giving the posthumous name $shihao$ and temple name $miaohao$
history_change_capital: $actor$ decided to move the capital to $place$
history_refund_empire: The imperial capital fell, but loyal ministers enthroned a new emperor at $place$, restoring the empire
history_back_to_original_capital: $actor$ lived up to expectations and finally recaptured $place$, restoring the old capital
history_kingdom_attack_for_title: $attacker$ launched war against $defender$ to seize the title $title$’s domain
history_kingdom_change_capital_to_title: $kingdom$ moved its capital to the title $title$’s seat at $city$
opinion_empire_clan_been_changed: The Empire Royal Family Has Been Changed
